Origin: Whew... We're almost to the outskirts of town.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yep! We've got to hurry and warn the townspeople about the empire!
Why, hello there! How are you this lovely day, my dear fugitives?
They look fine. They're not even hurt...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Who are you? Imperial lackeys?
Bingo! You, my fine lizard friend, are a genius! How'd you like an apple?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Nghh... Like I'd even want one of those! No way I'd take a sweet, crispy, juicy...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Vyrn, you're drooling!
Ha-ha! We have an apple fan on our hands! Luckily I have a whole bucketfu—
Ow!
Enough with it, Drang. Waste any more time and I'll slice you up.

Name: Drang
Origin: Okay, okay, Sturm! I get it! Now stop poking me with your—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Look, we're in a hurry. If that's all you came to say, then can we be on our way now?

Name: Sturm
Origin: Absolutely not. Drang!

Name: Drang
Origin: Sure thing. So, my dear fugitives, I have a favor to ask of you...

Name: Lyria
Origin: A favor? If it's something we can do, then sure. I guess...

Name: Drang
Origin: You're quick on the uptake! Accept this sweet treat as your rewa—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow! I've been stabbed again!

Name: Sturm
Origin: Humph... You're on your way to warn the town of the empire, aren't you?

Name: Katalina
Origin: That's correct. So?

Name: Sturm
Origin: We'd rather you didn't. It'll be so much easier without their resistance.

Name: Katalina
Origin: And you think we'll do this favor for you?

Name: Sturm
Origin: Are you saying you won't?

Name: Drang
Origin: Now those are some scary faces! Don't you scowl like that, little lady, or your face might freeze!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Okay. If you say so...

Name: Drang
Origin: Good girl! Perhaps you'd like a marshmall—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Sturm
Origin: We're leaving, Drang.

Name: Drang
Origin: Wait, Sturm! Don't leave me here!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What was that about?

Name: Katalina
Origin: A warning from the empire, I guess. Let's hurry, but be extra careful.
As [Djeeta] and the others near the town, the number of monsters increases. Eager to repay the people who helped them earlier, they trudge on.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: What's the deal! The town's right there, but we're seeing even more monsters.

Name: Katalina
Origin: There are records that say the Grim Basin is responsible for putting monsters in a frenzy...

Name: Katalina
Origin: But not even the empire knows why so many monsters have appeared in recent years.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: So everything outside of town is pretty much a danger zone, huh?

Name: Lyria
Origin: But the people of that town helped us back at Siero's shop when we needed it most.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Indeed. We owe them a lot. And there's no better way to pay them back than by stopping the empire in its tracks, [Djeeta].
Sturm and Drang use Rackam as a bartering chip to get [Djeeta] and the others to leave the island. But they refuse to leave him behind.

Name: Drang
Origin: Why, hello! I see you've been quite bubbly in my absence...

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Drang
Origin: Sturm! I am stabbed by you yet again! Why?

Name: Sturm
Origin: You said something that annoyed me. As usual.

Name: Drang
Origin: And your only outlet is to make me into a pincushion?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You guys again!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Ask as much as you like. But we've no intention of doing you any favors.

Name: Drang
Origin: Nope! You've got us all wrong! We're not here for any favors this time.

Name: Sturm
Origin: We're here to make a trade... for this man's life.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Humph...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Rackam! What happened?

Name: Drang
Origin: He was caught red-handed, trying to sneak into town!

Name: Drang
Origin: How foolish! We knew of your spying ears, so naturally we set out our own spying eyes!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Oh, shut it already...

Name: Drang
Origin: Let's cut to the chase, hm? We'll give you a minnow of an airship and you swim, swim, swim away from this island! Okay?

Name: Lyria
Origin: [Djeeta]...

Name: Katalina
Origin: I don't even need to ask what you'll say, do I, [Djeeta]?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Got that right! Simple question, simple answer!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Agreed... Sorry, Drang, but we're going to have to send you off!

Name: Drang
Origin: Oh, deary me! And yet more foolish lives are lost...

Name: Lyria
Origin: We'll save both the villagers and Rackam! No one's going to lose their lives to the empire!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Let's roll, [Djeeta]! We're gonna send 'em crying to their mommies!
Rackam is hauled away and Sturm grabs hold of Lyria. But a piercing shot turns the tables in favor of [Djeeta] and the others.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: This is bad, guys. I don't see Rackam anywhere!

Name: Sturm
Origin: He'll be fine. He's been taken away by one of our finest units. More importantly...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Eep!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Lyria!

Name: Sturm
Origin: You let your guard down. So we'll start with this little brat first...

Name: Rackam
Origin: I sure hope those units weren't your finest...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Rackam! Where'd you come from?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Ha! I might've played along if they were tough, but I'm not getting carted off by those two-bit grunts!

Name: Rackam
Origin: You okay, little miss?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yes... Thank you!

Name: Sturm
Origin: Tch... One more fighter on your side hardly matters. You'll never win against the empire!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Hey, [Djeeta]! You'd better get ready, because it's do or die!
Rackam decides to help [Djeeta] and the others stand up against the empire for the sake of the town.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Rackam! I'm so glad to see you're okay!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Come on, guys... If you're gonna talk big about saving me and the town, then follow through!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Yeah... Sorry about that...

Name: Lyria
Origin: We're just glad you're safe. Right, [Djeeta]?

Name: Katalina
Origin: You surprised me. I figured if you escaped that unit, you'd just leave us all behind.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Gimme a little credit! I mean, although I had a few thoughts about it...

Name: Rackam
Origin: I remembered what you said, you know? About ignoring the lives at stake right in front of you...

Name: Rackam
Origin: I saw you in trouble and my legs just started moving.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Is that so? Well, one way or another, you saved us. You have our thanks once again.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Would you cut it out? You're makin' me blush! Just save your thanks till this is all over!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Yeah! We're almost to the town! Let's get to stepping!
With Rackam's battle skills, [Djeeta] and the others fight through the swarm of soldiers.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Well, well, well... Looks like the empire's running out of soldiers!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: This Rackam guy knows what he's doing!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Indeed. But I won't let him outdo me!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hee-hee! Everyone's giving it their all!

Name: Rackam
Origin: There's the town gate, [Djeeta]! Time to break through!
[Djeeta] and the others decide to let Sturm and Drang go. Rackam decides to join the fight against the empire.

Name: Drang
Origin: Egads! Heaven help us!

Name: Sturm
Origin: This is it...

Name: Drang
Origin: Hey! We've no intention of fighting! Won't you find it in your heart to forgive us?

Name: Drang
Origin: The empire just pays us! We're not loyal to them or anything! So c'mon, just—

Name: Drang
Origin: Ow!

Name: Sturm
Origin: You disgust me. Keep up this act and so help me...

Name: Drang
Origin:
Yikes! No, no, no!
Calm down now, Sturm!

Name: Rackam
Origin: So... what do we do with these goofballs?
Let's let them go.
Can't bring 'em with us...

Name: Drang
Origin:
Huh? Really?
Really, really?

Name: Sturm
Origin: Showing mercy to a foe is foolish, but I won't complain about being spared...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yeah. And he did ask nicely after all...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Besides, it wouldn't be very knightly to turn a sword on a surrendering foe.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: And it's not like you're die-hards. You were in it for the money. You're free to go!

Name: Drang
Origin: Oh, thank you, thank you! I owe you a million times over!

Name: Sturm
Origin: I'll not forget this... Next time the humiliation will be yours!
Sturm and Drang hurry away without lingering a moment longer.

Name: Rackam
Origin: So? Are you guys really planning on going to town to fight back against the empire?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Why wouldn't we? This is our chance to hit 'em where it hurts!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Good grief, you're a bunch of softies! But if you weren't, you wouldn't have tried to save me.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Looks like I'm with you! Besides, I like the fire in your eyes, [Djeeta].

Name: Lyria
Origin: So... you'll join us, Rackam?

Name: Rackam
Origin: You think I'd let the empire run roughshod over this town?

Name: Rackam
Origin: It's time they had a taste of their own medicine!
With Rackam now on their side, [Djeeta] and the others prepare to fight against the empire.
But the ambitions of their enemy are already beginning to swallow the archipelago whole.
ついに予選が開始される。予選の料理は「みや里」から派遣された職人が握る樹クラゲの軍艦巻きだった。団員達がスシに舌鼓を打つ一方、レッドラックとマッシュは桁違いの実力を見せ、本戦進出が決定してもスシを食べ続けて他の参加者達を圧倒する。会場には満腹を訴える呻き声と観客達の歓声が響き渡り、やがて制限時間が訪れるのだった。

予選開始の時刻が迫り、
続々と集まる参加者達。

刻一刻と会場の熱気は高まり、
観客達は大会の幕開けの瞬間を
目に焼き付けようとしていた。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
さあ！
ついにこの時がやって参りました！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
数多の猛者が、
たったひとつの栄冠を求めて
しのぎを削り合った熱いファイト！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
その中で生まれたドラマは数知れず！
今思い出しても、手に汗を握るような
興奮が蘇ることでしょう！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
そう！ その伝説の大会が！
本日復活いたします！

司会者の開幕宣言により、
会場のボルテージは最高潮に達する。

Name: コルル
Origin: す、すごい熱気であり申す……

Name: アーミラ
Origin:
私がいちばん食べて……
賞品の魚も食べる……！

Name: レオナ
Origin:
楽しもうって決めたけど、
やっぱり緊張するなぁ……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
ふふっ、お祭りって感じで
ワクワクします！

Name: シャルロッテ
Origin:
どのような料理が出てくるのか、
待ち遠しいでありますね。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
あれ、シャルロッテさん！
いつの間に？

Name: シャルロッテ
Origin:
ふふふ……
駆け込みでエントリーしたであります！

Name: ルリア
Origin:
そうだったんですね！
一緒に楽しみましょう、
シャルロッテさん！

Name: レッドラック
Origin: ふぅ……

Name: レッドラック
Origin: よぉし、やってやるぜッ！

賑やかなルリア達とは対照的に、
精神統一をして気合いを入れ直す
レッドラック。

他の参加者が優勝候補のレッドラックに
気後れする中、マッシュだけが
離れた場所から敵対心を向ける。

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
ふん……
今日こそはおどれに勝っちゃるけぇ、
見とれよ！ レッドラック！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
さあ、本日の予選のメニューは
こちらでございます！

Name: 司会者
Origin: 樹クラゲの軍艦巻き、でございます！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
皆様、こちら初めて目にする
料理かと存じます。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
しかし！
スシと申し上げれば、ご存じの方も
いらっしゃるのではないでしょうか！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
おお！
なんか見覚えあると思ったら、
やっぱスシだったか！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
こちらは、トォノシ島の名物料理である
スシから着想を得た一品であります！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
定番のアルバコアやシャーモンの
代わりに樹クラゲの刺身を使用した、
一風変わった料理でありますが……

Name: 司会者
Origin:
その身はコリコリと弾力があり、
噛めば噛むほど旨味が湧き出し、
シャリのほのかな甘みと調和する……

Name: 司会者
Origin:
一度食べたら虜になる、
至極の一品となっております！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
なお、こちらのスシは
トォノシ島屈指の名店「みや里」から
派遣された職人が握っております！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
今回のアウギュステの現状を聞きつけ、
ぜひとも協力したいと、スポンサーに
名乗りを上げていただきました！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
なぁ、「みや里」だってよ！
セワスのじいちゃんが言ってた
知り合いってキュウタ達のことか！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あいつら今も頑張ってんだな！
オイラ安心したぜ！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
さて、ここで改めて
予選のルールをご説明いたします。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
参加者の皆様は、
こちらが設定した数量を上回れば
予選通過となります。

Name: 司会者
Origin: 合計、100貫が通過ラインとなります！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
100貫！？
予選でそのレベルかよ！？

Name: 司会者
Origin:
では係員の皆様、
参加者の方々に料理の提供を
お願いいたします。

司会者のひと言で、
控えていた係員が参加者の目の前に
スシを運んでいく。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
スシ下駄が空になったら
係の者をお呼びください。
順次新しいスシをお持ちいたします。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
100貫完食した方は手を挙げて報告を。
口の中が空かどうか確認し、
問題がなければ予選通過といたします。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
では、長らくお待たせいたしました！
これより、僭越ながら私が
開始の号令をかけさせていただきます！

司会者の宣言に合わせて
会場は一瞬静まり返り、
その瞬間を待ちわびる。

Name: 司会者
Origin: それでは……予選、スタートです！

一気に湧き上がる歓声とともに、
参加者達は一斉に
目の前のスシに食らいつく。

Name: コルル
Origin:
では……
いただくでごんす！
もぐ、もぐ……

Name: コルル
Origin:
……っ！？
こ、これはなんとも
美味で申すな！

Name: コルル
Origin:
これをどれだけ食してもよいとは！
贅沢の極みでごんす～！

Name: アーミラ
Origin:
はむ！ あむあむっ！
もぐもぐもぐ……ごくん！

Name: アーミラ
Origin:
美味しい……！
もっと！

Name: レオナ
Origin: あ、私もおかわりお願いしまーす。

早くもスシ下駄を空にした
アーミラとレオナの目の前に、
新たにスシが運ばれてくる。

Name: レオナ
Origin:
う～ん、美味しい～！
これならいくらでも
食べられそう……

Name: ルリア
Origin:
そうですね～！
シェロさんの言ってた通り、
食感がたまらないです！

Name: シャルロッテ
Origin:
スシ……
初めて口にしたでありますが、
想像以上に美味しいであります！

Name: シャルロッテ
Origin:
いつか定番のネタも
味わってみたいでありますね！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ははっ！
皆、幸せそうに食ってんなぁ！

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
ああ……本当に素敵な料理です。
スシというものがこれほどとは。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あっ、ルシオじゃねぇか！
あいつ参加してやがったのか！

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
卓越の技の数々を用いながら、
あえて多くを語らず。
これが粋というものなのでしょうか。

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
フフ。サンちゃんの珈琲とともに
頂きたいところですが、ここは
その技をしかと味わうとしましょう。

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
すみません、係の方。
熱いお茶を頂いても？

Name: ビィ
Origin:
あいつ、全く勝つ気ねぇな……
むしろ清々しいぜ……

Name: レッドラックの声
Origin: うおおおおおおッ！！

会場中に響き渡る大声に、
[ジータ]達を含めた観客の
視線が集中する。

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
おらあッ！
どんどん持ってこいッ！！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
おおっと！ レッドラック選手！
すごい勢いだ！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
多くの選手がようやく
１人前といったところ、
すでに５、６人前は平らげている！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
これはレッドラック選手の
独壇場か──

Name: マッシュ
Origin: うっだらあッ！！

司会者の声を遮るように
大声を張り上げたマッシュは、
スシをまとめて潰し、口に放り込む。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
いや！
マッシュ選手も並んでいる！

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
っぷはあ！
うし！ 100貫、完食だッ！

Name: マッシュ
Origin: こっちもじゃあッ！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
な、なななんと！
レッドラック選手とマッシュ選手、
ほぼ同時に完食！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
で、では失礼ながら
お口の中を確認いたします。

司会者はレッドラックとマッシュの
口の中を覗き込み、力強く頷く。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
両選手、完食ッ！
予選通過ですッ！！

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
だっはっは！
余裕余裕！

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
こがぁな量、
食ったうちに入らんわい！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
両選手、お疲れ様でした！
明日の本戦もこの調子で──

Name: レッドラック
Origin: なあ、あと５人前追加でいいか？

Name: 司会者
Origin:
えっ……？
すでに予選は通過していますが……？

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
ただの腹ごしらえだ。
料理が足りねぇってんなら
遠慮しとくけどよ。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
い、いえ……！
料理は有り余っておりますので、
今すぐ用意いたします！

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
おう！
ならワシは10人前じゃ！

Name: 司会者
Origin: マ、マッシュ選手も、ですか……？

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
ああん？
だったら俺はさらに10人前追加だ！

Name: マッシュ
Origin: なんじゃと！

Name: レッドラック
Origin: 文句あっか！

Name: 司会者
Origin:
こ、これは予想だにしない場外戦！
他の選手は完全に置いてきぼりだ！

Name: 大会参加者の男性１
Origin: ど、どんな胃袋してんだ……

Name: 大会参加者の男性２
Origin:
あんな化け物連中、
勝てるわけねぇよ……

レッドラックとマッシュの
底無しの実力を見せつけられ、
周囲の参加者は戦意を喪失してしまう。

参加者達の満腹を訴える呻き声と
観客達の歓声が響き渡る中、
やがて制限時間が訪れるのだった。
予選はアーミラが全体の３位で通過するという快挙を見せ、その他コルルとレオナが本戦に進出する。レッドラックとマッシュは同率１位で通過し、予選が終わっても火花を散らしていた。団の参加者達は予選の疲れを癒すためひと足先にグランサイファーに戻り、[ジータ]とビィはシェロカルテの手伝いに急ぐのだった。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
予選から想像を超える
ハイレベルな戦いが繰り広げられた、
今大会の幕開けとなりました……

Name: 司会者
Origin:
果たして、明日以降も
どのようなドラマが見られるのか、
いち観客として待ち遠しく思います。

Name: 司会者
Origin:
では、見事予選を通過した皆様、
明日の本戦開始まで
ごゆっくりお過ごしください。

激闘の予選を終え、
大会に参加していた団員達は
[ジータ]達の元に戻ってくる。

Name: ビィ
Origin: よぉ、皆お疲れさん！

Name: コルル
Origin:
や、やり申した！
予選通過でごんす！

Name: イオ
Origin:
おめでとう、コルル！
カッコよかったわよ！

Name: コルル
Origin:
イオの声援のおかげでごんす！
わたしにはしかと聞こえており申した！

Name: レオナ
Origin:
あはは、私も通過しちゃった……
あんまり食べたって感じ
しなかったんだけど。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
いやいや、結構な食べっぷりだったぜ。
この調子なら明日も
いい勝負出来るかもな！

Name: レオナ
Origin:
そ、そうかな……うん。
やれるだけ頑張ってみるね。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
それにしても、予想外だったのは
アーミラだよな！
まさか全体の３位で通過なんてよ！

Name: アーミラ
Origin: え……これで明日も食べれる？

Name: ビィ
Origin:
お前、自分のことなのに
気付いてなかったのかよ……

予選を通過したコルル、アーミラ、
レオナの後ろから、やや肩を落とした
ルリアとシャルロッテが歩いてくる。

Name: ルリア
Origin: あはは、負けちゃいました……

Name: シャルロッテ
Origin: 残念であります……

Name: ビィ
Origin:
いやぁ惜しかったぜ、ふたりとも！
特にルリアは、もうちょい時間がありゃ
いけたと思うぜ！

Name: ルリア
Origin:
頑張って通過したかったですけど、
精一杯の結果なので後悔はないです。
よく頑張った
楽しそうで何より

Name: ルリア
Origin:
ありがとうございます、[ジータ]！
そう言ってもらえるだけで
私、とっても嬉しいです！

Name: ルリア
Origin:
はい！ とても楽しかったです！
この大会に参加させてくれて
ありがとうございます！

Name: ルリア
Origin:
私は負けちゃいましたけど、
代わりに皆さんを応援しますからね！

Name: シャルロッテ
Origin:
自分も予選通過は
叶わなかったでありますが……

Name: シャルロッテ
Origin:
結果は結果として真摯に受け止め、
自分も応援に専念するであります！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
おう、それがいいぜ！
誰が勝っても恨みっこなしってことで
応援だ！

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
フフ。自らの敗北を悔やむより
友人の勝利を喜ぶとは美しき友情です。
私からも称賛を。

ルシオは微笑みを浮かべながら、
一行の団結力に感銘を受けて
拍手を送る。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
いや褒めてくれんのはありがてぇけど、
お前も負けたんだから
ちょっとは悔しいとか思わねぇのかよ？

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
いえ。そもそも私は
勝負の場におりませんでしたから。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
はぁ？
だってお前、呑気にスシ食って……

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
この催しの見学をしていたところ、
参加者と間違われてしまったようです。

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
誤解は解けたのですが、
是非にとのことでしたので
厚意に甘えて。

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
料理のために供された命に
背を向けることも
できませんでしたから。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
だからゆっくり食ってたのかよ。
勝ち負け関係ねぇからって。

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
その通りです。
あとでお代を渡しにいきますよ。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
はぁ……
相変わらずマイペースなやつだぜ……

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
フフ。主役を差し置いて
目立つわけにもいきませんから。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
主役？ おっさんのことか？
そういやおっさんのほうは……

ビィが一瞥する先には、
レッドラックとマッシュが
互いに睨み合い、火花を散らしていた。

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
ワシとおどれが同率１位じゃと？
気に食わんのう！

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
こっちのセリフだぜ！
とっくに予選通過してるってのに、
意地張って対抗しやがって！

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
ワシは他の連中に
見せつけたったんじゃ！
優勝は譲らんど、ってのう！

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
はっ、よく言うぜ！
チラチラチラチラ何度も
こっち見てやがったくせに！

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
俺は準備運動のつもりで
食ってたってのによぉ！

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
このカバチタレがぁッ！
んならワシは準備運動の準備運動じゃ！

Name: レッドラック
Origin:
なんだそりゃ！
てめぇこそ屁理屈こねてんじゃねぇ！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
さっきからあんな感じだからよ。
邪魔するのもなんか悪ぃと思って。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
そ、そうですね……
私達だけでも先に艇に戻りましょうか。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ああ、悪ぃなルリア。
オイラ達はこれからよろず屋の
手伝いがあるから、先行っててくれよ。

Name: ルリア
Origin:
あっ、そうでしたね……！
私も手伝いましょうか？

Name: ビィ
Origin:
平気平気！
ルリアはさっきの予選で疲れてるだろ？
気にせず休めって！

Name: ルリア
Origin:
そういうことでしたら……
じゃあ、お言葉に甘えて
今日はゆっくり休みますね！

Name: ビィ
Origin: おう！ またあとでな！

激闘の予選を終え、翌日に備えて
ひと足先に休もうと
グランサイファーに戻る大会参加者達。

[ジータ]とビィは参加者達を
見送り、シェロカルテの手伝いに
急ぐのだった。
大食い大会の予選から少し時間が過ぎた頃、マッシュが無人の浜辺で血眼になって落とし物を探していると、通りかかったルシオがマッシュに小瓶を渡す。マッシュはルシオに感謝しつつも、小瓶のことは誰にも打ち明けるなとルシオを脅し、最後は上機嫌に去っていく。ルシオは去っていくマッシュの背中を見送りながら、思案顔を浮かべるのだった。

Name: マッシュ
Origin: クソッ、どこいったんじゃ……！

大食い大会の予選が終わり、
少し時間が過ぎた頃……

参加者や観客がすでに
会場を後にした無人の浜辺で、
マッシュは落とし物を探していた。

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
アレがのうなったら、ワシは……
ワシの夢はどうなるんじゃ……！

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
優勝を逃したら、ワシを育ててくれた
あん人らに顔向けできん……！

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
絶対に見つけちゃる……
さっさと出てこんかい！

マッシュは砂浜に両膝をつき、
苛立ち交じりに指先で砂をかき分ける。

血眼になってしばらく探していると、
近付いてくる砂を踏む音に気付き、
マッシュは慌てて顔を上げる。

Name: ルシオ
Origin: お探しのものはこれでしょうか？

Name: マッシュ
Origin: おおっ！ それじゃそれじゃ！！

ルシオが差し出した小瓶を、
マッシュは奪い取るような勢いで
素早く掴み取る。

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
いやぁ、たいがたいのう！
ワシとしたことが、
うっかりしとったわい！

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
よかった。誰かの想いが
宿っていたように思えて、
預かっていたのです。

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
がははっ！
兄ちゃん、気が回るのう！
勲章モンじゃ！

Name: ルシオ
Origin: お役に立てて何よりです。

最初は明るく笑っていた
マッシュだったが、次第にその表情が
険しいものに変わっていく。

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
のう、兄ちゃん。
恩人にこがぁなこと
言いとうないんじゃがのう……

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
このこと、誰にも
チンコロしよったらアカンど？
ええか？

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
チンコロするな、とは……
ああ、「誰にも話すな」
ということですね。

Name: ルシオ
Origin:
わかりました。
私も無用なトラブルは好みませんので。

Name: マッシュ
Origin: おう！ 物分かりええのう！

ドスの利いた声から一転、
マッシュは上機嫌に笑い声を上げて
ルシオの肩を軽く叩く。

Name: マッシュ
Origin:
ほんじゃあ、ワシは帰るわい！
これも何かの縁じゃ、
明日のワシの応援よろしゅうの！

Name: ルシオ
Origin: ええ、それではまた……

マッシュは背中を向けたまま手を振り、
弾んだ足取りで去っていく。

ルシオは、遠ざかる
マッシュの背中を見送りながら
思案顔を浮かべるのだった。
大会の喧騒も去った真夜中の浜辺で、[ジータ]とビィはグランサイファーに戻る途中、金属の摩擦音に似た謎の音を耳にするが、幻聴だと聞き流す。同時刻、樹クラゲの集団が同胞の復讐のため闇夜に紛れて上陸する。しかし謎の物体が樹クラゲを跳ね飛ばし、八つ裂きにして捕食してしまう。謎の物体は捕食を終えると、上空に飛び立って海の彼方に消えてしまうのだった。

大会の喧騒も去り、
潮騒が心地よく耳に染み入る
真夜中の浜辺。

[ジータ]とビィは
シェロカルテの手伝いを終えて、
グランサイファーに戻るところだった。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
ふぃ～、結構働いたなぁ……
さすがにクタクタだぜ。
疲れた……
明日も頑張ろう

Name: ビィ
Origin:
やっぱそうだよな。
今日はさっさとベッドに入って
ぐっすり眠ろうぜ！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
おう、もちろんだぜ！
応援に手伝いに、明日も
大忙しだからな！

Name: ビィ
Origin:
しっかし、さすがにこの時間だと
ほとんど人がいねぇな。
昼間の活気が嘘みてぇだぜ。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
……ん？
今、きゅるきゅる回転してる音が
聞こえたような……

Name: ビィ
Origin:
なんて、ケッタギアじゃあるまいし……
疲れてんだな、きっと。

Name: ビィ
Origin:
さぁて、早く帰るとすっか。
ルリアがオイラ達を待って
まだ起きてるかもしれねぇし。

[ジータ]とビィは金属の摩擦音に
似た音を幻聴だと聞き流し、
欠伸交じりに浜辺を去っていく。

暗闇に紛れるように、
真夜中の海から無人の浜辺に
次々と上陸する樹クラゲの集団。

多くの同胞を奪われた復讐を
果たさんと、明かりの灯る民家に
奇襲をかけようと息を潜めていた。
そのはずだったのだが……

ホイール音が響き渡った直後、
謎の物体が樹クラゲの集団を
跳ね飛ばし、八つ裂きにする。

謎の物体は樹クラゲを捕食し終えると、
上空に飛び立ち、そのまま
海の彼方へ消えてしまうのだった。

The food for the preliminary round is lumber jelly sushi prepared by chefs from Miyasato. While the participating crew members savor the food, Redluck and Mash steadily devour piece after piece, both of them continuing to eat even after finishing the hundred pieces needed to move on to the elimination round. Other competitors grow disheartened at the powerful display, while the crowd goes wild.
The stadium fills with people as the opening draws near.
Competitors and audience alike wait with barely contained excitement, an electric energy building in the air.

Name: Announcer
Origin: It's the moment you've aaaaall been waiting foooor!

Name: Announcer
Origin: The toughest, fiercest bottomless black holes all gathered in one place for glory and gains!

Name: Announcer
Origin: There's gonna be drama. There's gonna be sweat. There's gonna be adrenaline, and maybe even a few tears!

Name: Announcer
Origin: That's right, folks. Today's the day we bring back the legendary eating competition!
Cheers and hollers erupt the moment the announcer finishes speaking.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Wh-what an intense display...

Name: Amira
Origin: If I eat the most, I can eat the prize!

Name: Leona
Origin: I know we said we're doing this for fun, but actually being here is a little nerve-racking...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hehe, it's almost like being at a festival! I can't wait to start!

Name: Charlotta
Origin: I am anxious to see what kind of food they've prepared.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Oh, Charlotta! What are you doing here?

Name: Charlotta
Origin: A good question... But of course, I am a last-minute challenger!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yay! I'm so glad you could join us!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Phew...

Name: Redluck
Origin: I'm ready to do this!
In contrast to the lively members of the party, Redluck steels himself for the battle ahead.
Surrounding competitors nervously glance his way. Only Mash stands confident and glowers at his opponent.

Name: Mash
Origin: Just watch... Yer not gonna take this from me, Redluck!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Today our contestants will be eating...

Name: Announcer
Origin: Lumber jelly rolls!

Name: Announcer
Origin: A brand-new cuisine, never before seen!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Though I'm sure most of you are familiar with its telltale sushi shape, at least!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Sushi, huh? No wonder I feel like I've seen it before.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Sushi, for those of you who don't know, is a famed food item from Tono Island.

Name: Announcer
Origin: This lumber jelly version replaces its traditional albacore and salmun toppings. Blasphemous, I know, but hear me out first.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Lumber jelly's rubbery. It's chewy. But the more you chew it, the more the flavors come out, and it pairs amazingly with the sweetness of the rice.

Name: Announcer
Origin: One taste is enough to get you hooked!

Name: Announcer
Origin: To top it all off, we've got chefs from Miyasato preparing the sushi today! Yes, that's right, folks. Tono Island's famed sushi restaurant sent over its finest!

Name: Announcer
Origin: They graciously became a sponsor after hearing about the trouble on these shores!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa, Miyasato? Sevastien must've been talking 'bout Kyuta and the others earlier!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Glad to hear they're still at it!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Ahem. Next we've got some rules to go over for this first round.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Contestants hoping to progress past the preliminaries must eat a minimum predetermined amount.

Name: Announcer
Origin: But who here can down one hundred pieces and push the limits of their bellies?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: One hundred! Ain't that kinda high for an intro round?

Name: Announcer
Origin: Will our staff serve the contestants their first meal? Please and thank you.
Platters are brought forth immediately and set down, one in front of each eater.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Once you've finished a platter, signal one of the staff members and they'll get you another.

Name: Announcer
Origin: If you manage to finish all one hundred pieces, raise your hand, and I'll check your mouth and make sure you've swallowed every bite!

Name: Announcer
Origin: That about wraps it up for explanations, I think. Without further ado, I think it's time for the fun to begin!
The audience quiets as they wait for the announcer's signal.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Ready... Go!
Cheering and the clamor of dining instantly drown out the announcer.

Name: Kolulu
Origin: Thank you for the meal! Munch, chew...

Name: Kolulu
Origin: This... is incredibly delicious!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: I could eat a mountain of it! What a luxurious treat!

Name: Amira
Origin: Chomp! Gobble, munch! Bite, gnaw... Swallow!

Name: Amira
Origin: Tasty! More!

Name: Leona
Origin: Oh, may I have another platter as well?
Though the sushi nearly vanishes in the blink of an eye, more is brought to Amira and Leona just as quickly.

Name: Leona
Origin: Mmmm, this is so good! I feel like I could eat a hundred platters!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Same here! Siero really wasn't kidding about how addictive the texture is!

Name: Charlotta
Origin: So this is sushi... It's even more extravagantly scrumptious than I originally imagined!

Name: Charlotta
Origin: I would love to one day try the standard version as well!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Everyone's pretty happily stuffing their faces!

Name: Lucio
Origin: Spectacularly made. This 'sushi' has exceeded my expectations by leaps and bounds.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Wha? Is that Lucio? He's competing too?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Clearly various refined techniques were used, but not in excess. A tasteful balance, one could say.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Hehe. It would be wonderful to have a cup of Sandy's coffee with this meal, but I shall instead focus on the chef's technique.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Excuse me. May I have a cup of hot tea?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Er... Can we even call that competing? 'Cause it looks more like he's enjoyin' a meal out on the town.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Haaaaaahhh!
A sudden roar by a familiar voice grabs the audience's attention.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Come on! Platter me up, let's go!

Name: Announcer
Origin: And there goes Redluck! He is pumped!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Most of the other competitors have barely finished their first platter, but he's already on his fifth or sixth!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Will Redluck cross the finish line unchallenged—

Name: Mash
Origin: Hrrraahhhh!
Almost as if in defiance of the cheering, Mash smashes the sushi on his platter and scoops the mush into his mouth.

Name: Announcer
Origin: Wait! Mash has eaten just as much!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Burp! All right, that's one hundred pieces eaten!

Name: Mash
Origin: Same here!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Wh-wh-wh-what! Redluck and Mash, in a crazy turn of events, have finished at nearly the exact same time!

Name: Announcer
Origin: But before we can give them a passing grade... Please excuse me while I perform the mandatory check!
After a quick peek into their open mouths, the announcer gives an enthusiastic nod and two thumbs up.

Name: Announcer
Origin: That's a wrap, folks! These two are moving on to the elimination round!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Wahaha! Easy as pie!

Name: Mash
Origin: You call that a challenge? Already burned off the calories I ate!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Good work today! I'm excited to see how you do tomorrow—

Name: Redluck
Origin: Hey, do you mind if I have five more platters?

Name: Announcer
Origin: What? I'm afraid I don't understand. You've already passed this round.

Name: Redluck
Origin: Just trying to fill up. If there's not enough food to go around though, don't worry about it.

Name: Announcer
Origin: N-no, we have plenty! I'll ask them to prepare some at once!

Name: Mash
Origin: Don't forget 'bout me! I'll take ten more platters!

Name: Announcer
Origin: Y-you as well?

Name: Redluck
Origin: You will, eh? Slap on another ten platters for me then!

Name: Mash
Origin: What're you playin' at!

Name: Redluck
Origin: You got a problem?

Name: Announcer
Origin: We've got another competition outside the competition, folks! These two are leaving all the other contestants in the dust!

Name: Competitor 1
Origin: What kinda stuff are their stomachs made of?

Name: Competitor 2
Origin: No way we can win against monsters like 'em...
Disheartening murmurs spread among the other challengers.
Eventually the timer rings over defeated groans and encouraging shouts, and the first round draws to a close.

Amira takes third place, much to the surprise of the arena, while Kolulu and Leona also manage to clear the hundred-piece hurdle and pass. Redluck and Mash tie for first, the animosity between them growing even after the prelims finish. Everyone returns to the Grandcypher to rest except [Djeeta] and Vyrn, who leave to assist Sierokarte.

Name: Announcer
Origin: And that concludes the wilder-than-expected preliminary round...

Name: Announcer
Origin: Makes you wonder what kind of drama tomorrow'll bring, but I guess we'll find out soon.

Name: Announcer
Origin: To all those who made it, good luck, and have a nice rest of your day!
[Djeeta] and Vyrn meet back up with their friends afterward.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Heya, good job back there!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: I truly did it! I passed the preliminaries!

Name: Io
Origin: Congrats, Kolulu! You were awesome!

Name: Kolulu
Origin: I couldn't have done it without you, Io! I heard your encouragement, loud and clear!

Name: Leona
Origin: Ahaha, I passed as well... Can't say I feel like I ate that much though.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: In what world is ten platters of sushi not that much... But I guess if you've still got room for more, tomorrow should be easy!

Name: Leona
Origin: Maybe? Maybe not. I'll give it my best shot at least.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Well, Amira definitely won't have a problem. Sure blew me away to watch her take third place today!

Name: Amira
Origin: Did I? Does that mean I can eat more tomorrow?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Did... you not realize?
While Kolulu, Amira, and Leona drink in their victory, Lyria and Charlotta drag their feet behind the rest of the group and hang their heads low.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Ahaha, we didn't make it...

Name: Charlotta
Origin: A real shame...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You guys came so close too—Lyria 'specially. Just a little more time and you woulda finished.

Name: Lyria
Origin: But I did my best, and that's what counts.
It was a good hustle.
You had fun too, right?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Thank you, [Djeeta]! I feel a little better after hearing that from you.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yeah, it was super fun! Thanks for letting me join.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Now that I'm out, I'll be sure to cheer everyone else on twice as hard!

Name: Charlotta
Origin: My own dreams of victory may not have come true...

Name: Charlotta
Origin: But I will accept my fate and put my heart into cheering as well!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I like that! Supporting each other and showin' there's no hard feelings or nothing.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Hoping for another's victory despite your defeat is truly an admirable display of friendship.
Lucio gives an easygoing smile and claps in support of the crew's solidarity.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Appreciate the compliment, but shouldn't you be at least a little upset that you lost too?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Lost? I was never entered into the race in the first place.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huh? But you were eating sushi...

Name: Lucio
Origin: I was mistaken for a participant while studying the festivities.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Eventually I managed to clear up the misunderstanding, but at the time I decided the best course of action was to partake in their generosity.

Name: Lucio
Origin: I could not in good conscience waste food that someone slaved over.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: So you took your time eatin' because winning or losing had nothing to do with you.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Precisely. I promise I'll pay them properly later.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Sigh... You're a real free-spirited guy, you know that?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Hehe, it wouldn't be polite of me to steal the spotlight from the star, after all.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: The what? You talking about the big guy? Speaking of which...
A quick glance around reveals Redluck engaged in a heated glaring contest with Mash.

Name: Mash
Origin: Tying for first place with me? You tryna pick a fight?

Name: Redluck
Origin: That's my line! You already passed, so what the heck was all that asking for extra at the end?

Name: Mash
Origin: I had ta show everyone else that I mean business!

Name: Redluck
Origin: Hah, you're really gonna try to pull that after sneaking glances my way the whole time?

Name: Redluck
Origin: I was only eating to warm up for tomorrow!

Name: Mash
Origin: Now you're arguin' just to argue! Obviously I was eating as a warm-up for my warm-up!

Name: Redluck
Origin: That doesn't even make sense! Who's actually arguing just to argue here, huh?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: They've been at each other's throats since we left, and I'm not sure we should get involved.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Probably not... Should we head back to the ship first?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Ah, sorry, no can do. Me and [Djeeta] hafta help the Knickknack Shack soon.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Oh, I totally forgot! Can I pitch in too?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Nah, you just focus on restin' up. I'm sure you're tired after everything earlier.

Name: Lyria
Origin: If you're sure... I'll do just that then!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Go for it! We'll catch ya later.
Ready to rest after all the excitement, Lyria and the other crew competitors return to the Grandcypher.
[Djeeta] and Vyrn send them off and head over to meet Sierokarte.

A little while after the preliminary round finishes, Mash scrambles around the empty beach in search of something. Lucio passes by and hands over the small bottle which Mash has been searching for. Mash thanks him profusely, then warns him not to tell anyone about the bottle before cheerfully walking away. Lucio watches him leave, a pensive expression on his face.

Name: Mash
Origin: Damn it! Where'd it go!
A little while after the preliminaries conclude, Mash rushes around alone.
He searches through the sandy ground of the empty stadium with barely contained panic.

Name: Mash
Origin: I hafta find it... No matter what! Otherwise how am I gonna do this?

Name: Mash
Origin: If I don't win, how am I ever gonna face 'em again?

Name: Mash
Origin: It's gotta be here somewhere! C'mon!
He drops down and digs left and right, hoping to uncover the lost item.
Only when he hears approaching footsteps does he look up, eyes bloodshot.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Were you looking for this?

Name: Mash
Origin: Yeah! That's it, that's totally it!
Mash frantically snatches the small bottle from Lucio's outstretched hand.

Name: Mash
Origin: Thank ya, seriously! Can't believe I dropped it.

Name: Lucio
Origin: I'm glad it found its way back to you. It seemed to be a very important, very treasured object.

Name: Mash
Origin: Wahaha! You got a good eye for details, pal! 'Fraid I ain't got much to repay ya with though.

Name: Lucio
Origin: That's quite all right. I'm glad to have been of service.
The chipper smile falls from Mash's face as his expression grows dour.

Name: Mash
Origin: Hey, pal. I know you did me a huge one, but listen...

Name: Mash
Origin: This here's sensitive stuff, got it? You ain't allowed to peep 'bout it to anyone.

Name: Lucio
Origin: To peep... like a bird? Ah, you mean to speak about it.

Name: Lucio
Origin: Understood. I'm not fond of stirring up a fuss myself.

Name: Mash
Origin: Great, glad we see eye to eye!
Just as quickly as his hackles were raised, Mash breaks out into a bright grin and claps Lucio on the shoulder.

Name: Mash
Origin: I better get goin'! You'll root for me tomorrow, eh?

Name: Lucio
Origin: Of course. Till next we meet.
Mash gives a wave and makes his way off the beach.
Lucio watches him walk away, a pensive look crossing his features.

Late at night on the quiet beach, [Djeeta] and Vyrn make their way back to the Grandcypher when they suddenly hear a mysterious metallic, grating noise. Deciding that they are tired and must be imagining the noise, they ignore it and move on. Afterward, a group of lumber jellies land on the beach and prepare to exact revenge on the people eating their brethren. Before they can move, however, a mysterious creature tears the lumber jellies apart, feeds on them, and disappears into the night.
The day's hustle and bustle fade into night, and a peaceful quiet washes over moonlit shores.
It is close to midnight when [Djeeta] and Vyrn finally finish and return to the Grandcypher.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Phew, Siero really put us through the wringer... I'm super beat.
Same...
Let's do our best tomorrow too.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Been a day, huh? Can't wait to crawl into bed and catch some z's!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Course we will! Our friends are countin' on us!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Gotta say though, it sure is quiet this late. Like a totally different world from earlier.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Huh? Did you hear that? Sounded like something whooshing around, rotatin'...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: There's no way there's a gearcycle around these parts, right? Must be more tired than I thought.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Better hurry back. I bet ya Lyria's stayed up past her bedtime trying to wait for us.
[Djeeta] and Vyrn agree that they are imagining the metallic, grating noise and pick up the pace after exchanging yawns.
Under the cover of darkness, a smack of lumber jellies crawls onto the empty beach.
Revenge for their brethren-turned-sustenance is the goal, and their first targets are the dimly lit houses nearby.
However, the surprise attack does not go as planned.
The sound of turning wheels is the only warning the lumber jellies have before they are torn limb from limb and splattered in the sand.
The hungry assailant completes its feeding, launches into the air, and flies out into the distant ocean horizon.
